languages.text: {n}Уголок его рта недовольно дергается.{/n} "Пока твой ручной инквизитор не стал разнюхивать, кто я такой, и путать мне карты. Окружаешь себя полезными слугами, да? А вот я окружен товарищами — верными и смелыми, которые помогали мне скрываться, рискуя жизнью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Уголок его рта недовольно дергается.{/n} "Пока твой ручной инквизитор не стал разнюхивать, кто я такой, и путать мне карты. Окружаешь себя полезными слугами, да? А вот я окружен товарищами — верными и смелыми, которые помогали мне скрываться, рискуя жизнью".

languages.text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."
languages.original_text: {n}Уголок его рта недовольно дергается.{/n} "Пока твой ручной инквизитор не стал разнюхивать, кто я такой, и путать мне карты. Окружаешь себя полезными слугами, да? А вот я окружен товарищами — верными и смелыми, которые помогали мне скрываться, рискуя жизнью".

You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

{n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

{n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

languages.text: {n}La comisura de sus labios se contrae en un gesto contrariado.{/n} «Hasta que su mascota de la Inquisición empezó a husmear, preguntando por mí y fastidiándome el negocio. A usted le gusta rodearse de lacayos útiles, ¿verdad? Pues yo me rodeo de camaradas, gente leal y valiente que han arriesgado sus vidas para ocultarme».
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

traits.locale_text: {n}La comisura de sus labios se contrae en un gesto contrariado.{/n} «Hasta que su mascota de la Inquisición empezó a husmear, preguntando por mí y fastidiándome el negocio. A usted le gusta rodearse de lacayos útiles, ¿verdad? Pues yo me rodeo de camaradas, gente leal y valiente que han arriesgado sus vidas para ocultarme».

languages.text: {n}彼の口角が不愉快そうにゆがんだ。{/n}「あなたのペット異端審問官が、私の正体を嗅ぎ回り、私の計画を台無しにした。あなたは便利な下僕に囲まれているのかもしれないが、私は忠実で勇敢な同志に囲まれている。彼らは私を隠すために、命をかけてくれた」
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の口角が不愉快そうにゆがんだ。{/n}「あなたのペット異端審問官が、私の正体を嗅ぎ回り、私の計画を台無しにした。あなたは便利な下僕に囲まれているのかもしれないが、私は忠実で勇敢な同志に囲まれている。彼らは私を隠すために、命をかけてくれた」

languages.text: {n}他的嘴角不满地抽搐着。{/n}“一切都很顺利，直到你的宠物审讯官开始怀疑我的身份，打算扰乱我的计划。你身边的仆人还真是很有用，是吧？不过，幸好我周围有一群忠诚、勇敢的同志，他们冒着生命危险把我藏了起来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的嘴角不满地抽搐着。{/n}“一切都很顺利，直到你的宠物审讯官开始怀疑我的身份，打算扰乱我的计划。你身边的仆人还真是很有用，是吧？不过，幸好我周围有一群忠诚、勇敢的同志，他们冒着生命危险把我藏了起来。”

languages.text: {n}Sein Mundwinkel zuckt verärgert.{/n} "Bis Euer Schoßhund von Inquisitor in Erfahrung bringen wollte, wer ich bin und meine Karten durcheinander gebracht hat. Ihr umgebt Euch mit nützlichen Dienern, ja? Nun, ich bin von loyalen und mutigen Kameraden umgeben, die ihr Leben riskierten, um mich zu schützen."
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Mundwinkel zuckt verärgert.{/n} "Bis Euer Schoßhund von Inquisitor in Erfahrung bringen wollte, wer ich bin und meine Karten durcheinander gebracht hat. Ihr umgebt Euch mit nützlichen Dienern, ja? Nun, ich bin von loyalen und mutigen Kameraden umgeben, die ihr Leben riskierten, um mich zu schützen."

languages.text: {n}Ses lèvres tremblent de contrariété.{/n} « Jusqu'à ce que votre inquisiteur domestique se mette à fouiner et à mettre le nez dans mes affaires. Vous, vous aimez vous entourer de serviteurs utiles, n'est-ce pas ? Eh bien moi, je préfère de loin avoir des camarades loyaux et braves. Ils ont même été jusqu'à risquer leur vie pour me cacher. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses lèvres tremblent de contrariété.{/n} « Jusqu'à ce que votre inquisiteur domestique se mette à fouiner et à mettre le nez dans mes affaires. Vous, vous aimez vous entourer de serviteurs utiles, n'est-ce pas ? Eh bien moi, je préfère de loin avoir des camarades loyaux et braves. Ils ont même été jusqu'à risquer leur vie pour me cacher. »

languages.text: {n}Ağzının kenarı, memnuniyetsizlikle seğiriyor.{/n} "Ta ki evcil engizisyoncun, kim olduğuma dair bilgi toplayıp kartlarımı murdar etmeye başlayana dek... Etrafını işe yarar hizmetkârlarla dolduruyorsun, değil mi? Benim etrafımı yoldaşlarım sarıyor. Sadık ve cesurlar. Beni gizlemek için hayatlarını tehlikeye attılar."
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of his mouth twitches in displeasure.{/n} "Until your pet Inquisitor started sniffing around who I was and messing up my cards. You surround yourself with useful servants, yes? Well, I am surrounded by comrades — loyal and brave — who risked their lives to conceal me."
